Description / Comments:
Flag identifying whether the mortgage was purchased by Fannie
Mae or by Freddie Mac. Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac are
collectively referred to as the Enterprises in this document.

Sequential numerical identifier for mortgage not related to the
record number in the Census Tract File but matching the record
number in each associated multifamily National File unit class
record.

The percentage of the census tractâ€™s population that is classified
as belonging to a minority group, based on the 2000 decennial
census.

The ratio of the 2000 census tract median income to the 2000
local area median income. This is the ratio used to determine
whether the census tract qualifies as a low-income area for
purposes of the special affordable housing goal. (See definition
of low-income area in 12 CFR 1282.2; see also 12 CFR
1282.15(f)(1).)

Values:
1 = >=20% are especially-low-income (ELI)
and <40% are very-low-income (VLI)
2 = <20% ELI & >=40% VLI
3 = >=20% ELI & >=40% VLI
4 = <20% ELI & <40% VLI
8 = Not available
9 = Not eligible
0 = Missing
Description / Comments:
The categories are as established in connection with the Special
Affordable Housing Goal as it applies to multifamily housing.
See 12 CFR 1282.14(d). Very-low-income and especially-low-
income areas are census tracts in which the median income
does not exceed 60 percent or 50 percent of the area median
income, respectively.

Values:
1 = originated in same year as acquired
2 = originated prior to calendar year of acquisition
9 = missing

1 = Purchase
2 = Refinancing
3 = New construction
4 = Home Improvement/Rehabilitation
9 = Not applicable/not available
Description / Comments: Purpose of loan reported by the Enterprise.

Values:
1 = Mortgage Company
2 = Savings Association Insurance Fund (SAIF)- or Bank
Insurance Fund (BIF)-insured depository institution
3 = NCUA-insured Credit Union
4 = Other
Description / Comments:
The type of seller that sold the mortgage to the Enterprise; this
is not necessarily the originating lender.

Values:
1 = Yes (has some type of Federal Guarantee)
2 = No
3 = FHA Risk Sharing
9 = Not available

Description / Comments:
Physical number of units in the property (unadjusted for
REMIC weights and participations).

Flag identifying whether a unit is located in an area defined to
be underserved. See definition of underserved area in 12 CFR
1282.2. The unit may or may not count toward the Underserved
Areas goal depending on other counting provisions. (See 12
CFR 1282.15 and 12 CFR 1282.16.)
